otherBenefits.name: Cruise Coverage
otherBenefits.coverageLimit:
Missed Port of Call
If your cruise skips or changes a scheduled stop, you're covered. Coverage amount: SGD 700. Coverage per port: SGD 100
Cabin Confinement
If you're medically advised to stay in your cabin, get compensated. Coverage amount: SGD 70
Low or High Water
If water levels affect your river cruise itinerary, you're covered. Coverage amount: SGD 70. Coverage per port: SGD 15
Missed Shore Excursion(s)
If you miss prepaid excursion booked separately from your cruise package, you’re covered. Coverage amount: SGD 100
Denied Boarding
If you're denied boarding your cruise ship, we’ve got you covered. Coverage amount: SGD 1,000
